content.rendered:
Latest Posts

Salesforce #OhanaSlack

Salesforce #OhanaSlack is a Slack Workspace that’s available to connect with theSalesforce community and get real time help 24/7.

Read More

DF19 OhanaSlack Ice Cream Social

Dreamforce 19 was amazing, wasn’t it? So much fun seeing so many Ohana, all the awesome sessions, cool announcements, Obama!!! But this year at Dreamforce, I was able to do something a litt…

Read More

OhanaSlack Help



OhanaSlack Rules

Below you will find the OhanaSlack Rules for the slack workspace for ohana helping ohana on salesforce. Please follow.

Read More



OhanaSlack Email Change

How to change your slack user email address in OhanaSlack

Read More

Sign Up for OhanaSlack
Follow the links below to find out more about our amazing services.


Sign Up

excerpt.rendered: OhanaSlack Project: what is it, rules, help links, blog post links, sign up. Useful info for future and current members of the workspace.

@graph.name: Meighan Brodkey
@graph.description: Salesforce MVP, Slack pusher, learning fanatic, detail obsessed, WIT User Group leader, Technical Architect, ❤️ challenges. Former Girl Scout, current rockstar.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Automation Hour 2021: Einstein Bot Flows &  Omni-Channel Routing
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Curious about Einstein Bots, Flow, or the new Omni-Channel Routing functionality? In this episode of Automation Hour, you'll learn about AI and all of that inside of Salesforce from Technical Architect & Salesforce MVP, Meighan Brodkey.

img.alt_text: Automation Hour: Flows, Bots, and AI… OH MY!!!
